title: CS577
body:
Is it fine to take CS577 with CS400? or should i take CS400 first and leave 577 for after? I am coming from math 240 and math 340, idk if that would be enough proof prior to the class for me to do well in it  
and also what's the workload for stat301 like?
comments:
400 is a pre-req for CS 577 so you can't take 577 without taking 400 first.

Even if you are in some special program such that you can take class without satisfy pre-requisite, you should still take 400 first as it covers some ds/algorithm that is important for 577.
